title: Smoke Test Forecasting
description: This dataset comprises five unique time series with varying components, including sine-wave patterns, linear trends, periodic features, and random noise. It serves as an efficient resource for testing time series forecasting models and exploring pattern recognition and periodicity analysis.

additionalFeatures.name: sine
additionalFeatures.description: Numeric variable representing the sine component

additionalFeatures.name: trend
additionalFeatures.description: Numeric variable representing the linear trend component

additionalFeatures.name: add_step
additionalFeatures.description: Numeric variable representing that an offset is added on this sample
